event_text: The apprentices of the Clan are taking special training to learn how to disguise their scents from enemies with kelp and seawater.

As a storm rages across the beach and waves crash upon the shore, m_c is tucked up in the medicine cat den, {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} sleep anything but restful. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/keep/keeps} seeing flashes of prophecy_list_sight. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/wake/wakes} with a shiver, wondering what {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} dreams mean for the Clan.

As a storm rages across the beach and waves crash upon the shore, m_c is tucked up in the elders' den, {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} sleep anything but restful. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/keep/keeps} seeing flashes of prophecy_list_sight. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/wake/wakes} with a shiver, wondering what {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} dreams mean for the Clan.
The things {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} saw today: omen_list_sight... m_c dips a paw in a rockpool, watching the tiny, crawling life inside, and considering what the omens foretell.
m_c sits by the water, contemplating the calm waves that brush {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} paws and wondering why times are not as peaceful as the tides.
A huge wave crashes into camp, leaving everyone soaked and the herb stores irreparably damaged.
m_c plucks a pristine white flower from the camp's nearby frangipani bush. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/wear/wears} it with genuine joy, brighter than the beachy sun.
m_c plucks a pretty marigold from a nearby flower patch. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/wear/wears} it with poise.

Inbetween grooming m_c, r_c tucks the prettiest acc_plural {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} could find next to m_c's ear. m_c almost doesn't notice the next morning, but purrs a thank you to r_c when {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/walk/walks} by.

m_c's eyes sparkle as {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/realize/realizes} something wonderful - {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} can propagate the reeds on c_n territory, and decorate {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} nest with them! A week later, m_c is seen sleeping soundly with thick stalks of dark green reeds casting shadows on {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} pelt.

r_c has a wonderful idea for decorating m_c's nest! m_c wakes up in the middle of the night with reeds brushing {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} face. Despite the slight scare it gave m_c, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/thank/thanks} r_c in the morning for the gift.
m_c curiously pokes and prods at a crab that wandered into camp. The crab, unbothered to m_c's antics, seems relaxed enough to keep as a pet. m_c cheerfully shows off {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} new friend!

r_c decides to stop by m_c while {PRONOUN/m_c/subject}{VERB/m_c/'re/'s} sunbathing in camp, asking {PRONOUN/m_c/object} if {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} would like a crab {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} caught. m_c nods, interested, so r_c drops the critter on its back. However, m_c doesn't crack {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} jaws into its shell like expected. Instead, m_c flips it over and ogles it curiously. Seems like m_c has found a new friend...?
m_c catches a cool snail that slid into camp! {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/decide/decides} to keep the snail as a pet.
r_c and m_c find a cute snail with a pointy red shell while hanging out in camp together! m_c decides to keep it with {PRONOUN/m_c/object}.

When m_c peeks out of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} den, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/find/finds} that some seaweed has managed to get into camp. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/decide/decides} to use it as a cool decoration for {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} tail!
During a free sunny morning before the dawn patrol, r_c quietly wraps vibrant seaweed around m_c's tail.
